Pre-Game Insights: Minnesota Timberwolves and Denver Nuggets are set to face off in a Western Conference matchup on November 2, 2024.
Minnesota Timberwolves finished the previous season with a 56-26 overall record and 37-15 in Western Conference play.
The Timberwolves averaged 16.9 points off of turnovers, 13.5 second-chance points, and 32.3 bench points last season.
Denver Nuggets finished the previous season with a 57-25 overall record, 10-6 in Northwest Division games, and 24-17 on the road.
The Nuggets gave up 109.6 points per game while committing 18.2 fouls last season.
Timberwolves have no listed injuries for the upcoming game.
Nuggets' player DaRon Holmes II is out for the season due to an Achilles injury.
